review: This is one of the best products I have ever bought from Amazon. I own almost all of the products that amazon puts out and this one is by far the best. The remote is very sleek and sexy. It is expandable with the usb insert in the back. And for you tech people out there it is the best way to sync KODI (formally XBMC). It is very easy to use just buy this and an hdmi cable plug it all in and that's about all. I have only had a couple of times where I have had to restart the Fire because Prime was stalled out. But this by no means mean a dock in stars. To anyone looking to buy a product of this look no further this is it.
author: James
